9c0eba51095d3939437e220db196e27b.name: project_get
9c0eba51095d3939437e220db196e27b.text: 'Get Project by Id' endpoint correctly implemented

cases.name: Get Test Project
cases.description: request /projects/:id using test project id. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body matches Project object schema.
cases.summary: Test project successfully retrieved
audit: Response Body: {"version": "1.0", "studies": [{"parentProjectID": "9c0eba51095d3939437e220db196e27b", "version": "1.0", "tags": ["RNAgetCompliance"], "description": "Test study object used by RNAget compliance testing suite.", "name": "RNAgetTestStudy0", "id": "f3ba0b59bed0fa2f1030e7cb508324d1"}], "tags": ["RNAgetCompliance"], "description": "Test project object used by RNAget compliance testing suite.", "name": "RNAgetTestProject0", "id": "9c0eba51095d3939437e220db196e27b"}

cases.name: Project Not Found
cases.description: request /projects/:id using a project id known to not exist. Checks content type and status code (4xx). Validates response body matches Error schema.
cases.summary: Server sends correct response when requested project not found
audit: Response Body: {"message": "Entry not found in database."}

cases.name: Project Search Filters
cases.description: request /projects/search/filters. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body matches search filter array schema.
cases.summary: Project search filters successfully retrieved

cases.name: Search Projects Without Filters
cases.description: request /projects/search without any parameter filters. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body matches project array schema.
cases.summary: Projects can be searched without filters
audit: Response Body: [{"version": "1.0", "tags": ["PCAWG", "cancer"], "description": "Pan Cancer Analysis of Whole Genomes test data from Expression Atlas E-MTAB-5423", "name": "PCAWG", "id": "43378a5d48364f9d8cf3c3d5104df560"}, {"version": "1.0", "tags": ["RNAgetCompliance"], "description": "Test project object used by RNAget compliance testing suite.", "name": "RNAgetTestProject0", "id": "9c0eba51095d3939437e220db196e27b"}, {"version": "1.0", "tags": ["TCGA"], "description": "The Cancer Genome Atlas", "name": "TCGA", "id": "0dc1cb6327844b5aa6a1a4eed3f64607"}]

cases.name: Expression Search Format Not Specified
cases.description: request /expressions/search endpoint without specifying the required 'format' parameter. checks content type and status code (4xx). validates response body is an error message JSON.
cases.summary: Server returns error when format not specified
audit: Response Body: {"message": "Input payload validation failed", "errors": {"format": "format of data to return"}}

cases.name: Expression Search Filetypes Match
cases.description: request /expressions/search endpoint with 'format' parameter specified. checks content type and status code (200). validates expression objects in response body contain a fileType that matches the requested format.
cases.summary: Expression fileTypes match requested format

cases.name: Expression Search No Filetype Mismatches
cases.description: request /expressions/search with 'format' parameter that does not match the format of the expression in test dataset. checks content type and status code (200). validates expression objects in response body have a fileType matching the requested format.
cases.summary: Expression fileTypes match requested format

cases.name: Slice by featureIDList
cases.description: Asserts correct slicing/subsetting of expression matrix when slice parameters are passed to search endpoint
cases.summary: Sliced expression matrix rows, columns, and values match expected
audit: asserting number of rows matches number of supplied GeneIDs
asserting returned GeneIDs match supplied GeneIDs

cases.name: Slice by featureNameList
cases.description: Asserts correct slicing/subsetting of expression matrix when slice parameters are passed to search endpoint
cases.summary: Sliced expression matrix rows, columns, and values match expected
audit: asserting number of rows matches number of supplied GeneNames
asserting returned GeneNames match supplied GeneNames

cases.name: Slice by sampleIDList
cases.description: Asserts correct slicing/subsetting of expression matrix when slice parameters are passed to search endpoint
cases.summary: Sliced expression matrix rows, columns, and values match expected
audit: Request Params: {'version': '1.0', 'studyID': 'f3ba0b59bed0fa2f1030e7cb508324d1', 'format': 'loom', 'sampleIDList': 'DO22935 - primary tumour,DO20604 - primary tumour,DO48516 - primary tumour,DO42881 - primary tumour,DO6144 - primary tumour,DO40948 - primary tumour,DO472 - primary tumour,DO48505 - primary tumour'}
asserting number of columns matches number of supplied Samples
asserting returned Samples match supplied Samples

cases.description: Asserts correct slicing/subsetting of expression matrix when slice parameters are passed to search endpoint
cases.summary: Sliced expression matrix rows, columns, and values match expected

asserting number of rows matches number of supplied GeneIDs
asserting returned GeneIDs match supplied GeneIDs
asserting number of columns matches number of supplied Samples
asserting returned Samples match supplied Samples

cases.name: slice by featureNameList and sampleIDList
cases.description: Asserts correct slicing/subsetting of expression matrix when slice parameters are passed to search endpoint
cases.summary: Sliced expression matrix rows, columns, and values match expected
audit: Request Params: {'version': '1.0', 'studyID': 'f3ba0b59bed0fa2f1030e7cb508324d1', 'format': 'loom', 'featureNameList': 'SH3BP1,APOL5,RN7SL592P', 'sampleIDList': 'DO1249 - primary tumour,DO28763 - primary tumour,DO33408 - primary tumour,DO219961 - primary tumour,DO2995 - primary tumour,DO18671 - primary tumour,DO219106 - primary tumour'}
asserting number of rows matches number of supplied GeneNames
asserting returned GeneNames match supplied GeneNames
asserting number of columns matches number of supplied Samples
asserting returned Samples match supplied Samples

cases.name: Get Test Continuous
cases.description: request /continous/:id using test continuous id. checks content type and status code (200).
cases.summary: Test continuous successfully retrieved

cases.name: Continuous Not Found
cases.description: request /continuous/:id using a continuous id known to not exist. checks content type and status code (4xx). validates response body matches error schema in the specification
cases.summary: Server sends correct response when requested continuous not found
audit: Response Body: {"message": "Entry not found in database."}

cases.name: Continuous Get Start Specified Without Chr
cases.description: request /continuous/:id, specifying start parameter without chr. checks content type and status code (400). validates response body matches error schema
cases.summary: Server sends correct response when start is specified without chr
audit: Response Body: {"message": "chr required if either start or end is specified"}

cases.name: Continuous Get End Specified Without Chr
cases.description: request /continuous/:id, specifying end parameter without chr. checks content type and status code (400). validates response body matches error schema
cases.summary: Server sends correct response when end is specified without chr
audit: Response Body: {"message": "chr required if either start or end is specified"}

cases.name: Continuous Get Start Greater Than End
cases.description: request /continuous/:id, specifying chr, start, and end parameters, but start is greater than end. checks content type and status code (501). validates response body matches error schema
cases.summary: Server sends correct response when start is greater than end
audit: Response Body: {"message": "end < start is not implemented"}

asserting observed Position: chr1:66 equals expected: chr1:66

cases.name: Get Supported Expression Formats
cases.description: request /expressions/formats. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body is an array of strings.
cases.summary: Expression formats successfully retrieved

cases.name: Expression Search Filters
cases.description: request /expressions/search/filters. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body matches search filter array schema.
cases.summary: Expression search filters successfully retrieved

cases.name: Search Expressions by Format
cases.description: requests /expressions/search, only specifying the required 'format' parameter. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body matches expression array schema
cases.summary: Expressions can be searched by format

cases.name: Search Expressions With All Filters
cases.description: request /expressions/search using all server-supported expression filters. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body matches expression array schema.
cases.summary: Expressions can be searched with all filters specified

cases.name: Search Expressions With Single Filter, 1
cases.description: request /expressions/search using the first parameter filter supported by server (in addition to format). checks type and status code (200). validates response body matches expression array schema
cases.summary: Expressions can be searched when first filter parameter is supplied

cases.name: Search Expressions With Single Filter, 2
cases.description: request /expressions/search using the second parameter filter supported by server (in addition to format). checks type and status code (200). validates response body matches expression array schema
cases.summary: Expressions can be searched when second filter parameter is supplied

cases.name: Expression Search Filters Non-Matching Resources
cases.description: request /expressions/search using parameter filters that do not apply to any expression. checks content type and status code (200). validates response body is an empty array.
cases.summary: Expression search endpoint filters non-matching resources

cases.name: Expression Search Format Not Specified
cases.description: request /expressions/search endpoint without specifying the required 'format' parameter. checks content type and status code (4xx). validates response body is an error message JSON.
cases.summary: Server returns error when format not specified

cases.name: Expression Search Filetypes Match
cases.description: request /expressions/search endpoint with 'format' parameter specified. checks content type and status code (200). validates expression objects in response body contain a fileType that matches the requested format.
cases.summary: Expression fileTypes match requested format

cases.name: Expression Search No Filetype Mismatches
cases.description: request /expressions/search with 'format' parameter that does not match the format of the expression in test dataset. checks content type and status code (200). validates expression objects in response body have a fileType matching the requested format.
cases.summary: Expression fileTypes match requested format

cases.name: Slice by featureIDList
